Subscription.Description: Application crashes, hangs and error reporting logs.
Subscription.Query: <QueryList><Query Id="0" Path="Microsoft-Windows-Windows Defender/Operational"><Select Path="Microsoft-Windows-Windows Defender/Operational">*[System[(EventID=1123 or EventID=1124 or EventID=5007)]]</Select><Select Path="Microsoft-Windows-Windows Defender/WHC">*[System[(EventID=1123 or EventID=1124 or EventID=5007)]]</Select></Query><Query Id="1" Path="Microsoft-Windows-Security-Mitigations/KernelMode"><Select Path="Microsoft-Windows-Security-Mitigations/KernelMode">*</Select></Query><Query Id="2" Path="Microsoft-Windows-Security-Mitigations/UserMode"><Select Path="Microsoft-Windows-Security-Mitigations/UserMode">*</Select></Query><Query Id="3" Path="Microsoft-Windows-Win32k/Operational"><Select Path="Microsoft-Windows-Win32k/Operational">*[System[(EventID=260)]]</Select></Query><Query Id="4" Path="Microsoft-Windows-Windows Defender/Operational"><Select Path="Microsoft-Windows-Windows Defender/Operational">*[System[(EventID=1125 or EventID=1126)]]</Select><Select Path="Microsoft-Windows-Windows Defender/WHC">*[System[(EventID=1125 or EventID=1126)]]</Select></Query><Query Id="5" Path="Microsoft-Windows-Windows Firewall With Advanced Security/Firewall"><Select Path="Microsoft-Windows-Windows Firewall With Advanced Security/Firewall">*[System[Provider[@Name='Microsoft-Windows-Windows Firewall With Advanced Security'] and (Level=2 or Level=4 or Level=0) and (EventID=2004 or EventID=2009)]]</Select></Query><Query Id="6" Path="Security"><Select Path="Security">*[System[(EventID >=4944 and EventID <=4954)]]</Select><Select Path="Security">*[System[(EventID >=4956 and EventID <=4958)]]</Select></Query><Query Id="7" Path="Security"><Select Path="Security">*[System[(EventID=5024 or EventID=5025 or EventID=5037)]]</Select><Select Path="Security">*[System[(EventID >=5027 and EventID <=5030)]]</Select><Select Path="Security">*[System[(EventID >=5032 and EventID <=5035)]]</Select></Query></QueryList>
